snippet: Mr. Gingrich is attacking Mr. Romney in South Carolina as an untrustworthy "pro-abortion" moderate.
abstract: Mr. Gingrich is attacking Mr. Romney in South Carolina as an untrustworthy "pro-abortion" moderate.
lead_paragraph: Newt Gingrich has officially done away with the shades of gray in his anti-Mitt Romney ads.

headline.main: Gingrich Goes Negative in Anti-Romney Ad
